flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 goldfish because 15 / 0.25 = <<15/0.25=60>>60
75% of the fish are below the surface because 100 - 25 = <<100-25=75>>75
There are 54 goldfish below the surface because 60 x 0.75 = <<60*0.75=54>>54
#### 54

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
